HERO_DESCRIPTION_DEFAULT: Check your inbox. We sent a link for you to complete the login process.
HERO_DESCRIPTION_MODERATOR: Your invite has been processed successfully. Thanks for joining FastComments as a moderator.
MODERATOR_INFO: One thing you will notice is that FastComments doesn't use passwords by default. We use emails to authenticate you. You can set a password later.
THANK_YOU_MESSAGE: Thanks for using FastComments password-less login! You may now close this window.
